name: nghmcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnghm, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cr))

stmt.origin: simprd(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnghm, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnghm, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cr)), wa(wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, cngp)))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈(c1[NGHom]c2), (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧(c3 ` c0)∈ ℝ), (c1 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c2 ∈ NrmGrp))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnghm, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cr)))

cumulated.pretty:

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnghm, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c2, cngp)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cr))))
-| wceq(c3, co(c1, cnmo, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[NGHom]c2)↔((c1 ∈ NrmGrp ∧ c2 ∈ NrmGrp)∧(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧(c3 ` c0)∈ ℝ)))
⊣ c3 =(c1[normOp]c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cnghm, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c0), cr))
-| wceq(c3, co(c1, cnmo, c2))

comment: A normed group homomorphism has a real operator norm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)
